queries.mac: select href from html where url='http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/all/' and xpath='//tr[@id="en-US"]/td[@class="download mac"]/a/@href'
queries.windows: select href from html where url='http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/all/' and xpath='//tr[@id="en-US"]/td[@class="download win"]/a/@href'
queries.linux: select href from html where url='http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/all/' and xpath='//tr[@id="en-US"]/td[@class="download linux"]/a/@href'
